thread.title: Great welcome to New York -
thread.title_full: Great welcome to New York - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pamelaross7469
title: Great welcome to New York -
text:
Great central place to stay as just around corner from Empire State building. The hotel its self has great. It had a small shop which you could spend $10 daily that was charged free to your room and also between 5-6 nightly the hotel puts on meet your fellow traveller where you can exchange tales and get tips or just chat over complementary wine. Our room was on the 33 floor and we had a fantastic view down town. The room was large and spacious with a very large bed. The kitchen has handy although we only had breakfast in our room. There is a fabulous Thai restaurant right next door to the hotel and a diner just around the corner as well as plenty other places to chose from. The staff were all friendly and knowledgeable and I really couldn't fault the place.
Room Tip: There was a hairdryer, tv and iron in the room. Our room was cleaned daily and as I stated previous... See more room tips
